body:
### Steps to reproduce

```console
spack install bowtie
```


### Error message

```console
==> Error: ChecksumError: sha256 checksum failed for /tmp/runner/spack-stage/spack-stage-jdk-14_36-j2k4e757xfunfadrcvs7z7hgsrcxygbp/jdk-14_linux-x64_bin.tar.gz
    Expected 4639bbaecc9cc606f1a4b99fda1efcaefcbf57a7025b3828b095093a6c866afd but got 80212f7748c2671b89b6085000717c747851db004409dce3bb97f3a2aeb91cdd

/opt/spack/lib/spack/spack/package.py:1390, in do_fetch:
       1387        self.stage.fetch(mirror_only, err_msg=err_msg)
       1388        self._fetch_time = time.time() - start_time
       1389
  >>   1390        if checksum and self.version in self.versions:
       1391            self.stage.check()
       1392
       1393        self.stage.cache_local()
```

### Information on your system

Github workflow failure

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [X] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
title: checksum error jdk
